Header.paragraph: A safe and inclusive resort for everyone in Dalhousie University

Booking.paragraph: Book a room with us to confirm your stay

Testimonials.text: "The overall quality provided by Dal Vacation Home was excellent; I really enjoyed my stay. That room was so big, neat and with a magnificent aerial of the entire city."
Testimonials.name: John Smith

Testimonials.text: " The people who work there are very nice and supportive too. I advise anyone who is looking for a quiet place to relax to go there as soon as possible."
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Carter

Testimonials.text: "It was a seamless booking experience where the rooms were beyond my expectations. I am definitely returning as soon as possible. See you soon Dal Vacation Home!"
Testimonials.name: Uchi Tang

Testimonials.text: " The amenities were excellent, not to mention the convenient location of this hotel thereby making it a cinch to tour around the famous attractions in the area. Loved it!"
Testimonials.name: Sam Currain

Testimonials.text: "My experience at Dal Vacation Home was absolutely stunning. Moreover, the hotel staff was friendly and attentive so that they attended to all my needs. Overall, great feeling."
Testimonials.name: Mike Anthony

Testimonials.text: "The overall quality provided by Dal Vacation Home was excellent; I really enjoyed my stay. That room was so big, neat and with a magnificent aerial of the entire city."
Testimonials.name: Sarah

Features.title: Bedrooms Rentals
Features.text: Rent out 1-3 person rooms, subsidized for members

Features.title: Conference hall rentals
Features.text: Plan your trips and events by booking one of our fully stocked conference halls

Features.title: Playroom rentals
Features.text: Organize events or come as a group and enjoy all the facilites present in our playroom

Features.title: Theater room rentals
Features.text: Wanna have a theter experience but alone, book our theater room and enjoy any movie you need
